templateModal.title: Choose Template
templateModal.description: Select an existing template as a starting point for your wheel
templateModal.noTemplates: No templates available at the moment

welcome.title: Welcome to YearWheel!
welcome.description: Here you can plan your entire year in one place. Let us show you how it works in a quick tour.

innerRing.title: Add Inner Ring
innerRing.description: Inner rings represent areas like Goals or Campaigns. They appear inside the month ring and can contain text for each month.

outerRing.title: Add Outer Ring
outerRing.description: Outer rings appear outside the month ring. Perfect for longer activities like projects or campaigns with start and end dates.

activityGroups.title: Activity Groups
activityGroups.description: Color-code activities by creating groups. Click the color circle to change the color. Use this to organize different types of activities.

addActivity.title: Add Activity
addActivity.description: Create an activity by selecting a ring, dates, and activity group. The activity will appear immediately in the wheel. You can edit it later by clicking on it.

exportShare.title: Export & Share
exportShare.description: Export your wheel as PNG, JPEG, or SVG. You can also share it with others via a public link or copy it to the clipboard.

complete.title: All done! You're ready!
complete.description: You can always return to this guide by clicking the help icon. Good luck with your year planning!

welcome.title: Welcome to the AI Assistant!
welcome.description: The AI assistant helps you plan faster using natural language. The window can be moved and resized to fit your workflow.

window.title: AI Assistant Window
window.description: This is your AI assistant window. It floats above your editor and can be customized to your needs.

drag.title: Drag to Move
drag.description: Click and hold the title bar to drag the window to a different location. Position it wherever works best for you!

resize.title: Resize
resize.description: Hover over the edges or corners to reveal resize handles. Drag to make the window larger or smaller.

typeCommands.title: Type Commands
typeCommands.description: Use natural language to tell the AI what you want to do. Examples: 'Create a summer campaign from June 1 to August 31', 'Add an inner ring for goals', or 'Delete the Christmas sale activity'.

chatMessages.title: Conversation & Responses
chatMessages.description: The AI responds here and confirms actions. You can see the full history of your commands and the AI's responses. Scroll to view previous messages.

aiActions.title: AI Creates, Modifies & Deletes
aiActions.description:

complete.title: All Done!
complete.description: You're now ready to use the AI assistant! Describe what you want to do in natural language and the AI will help you.
